p: Although the exact mechanism mediating the chronic manifestations of SARS-CoV-2 infection is currently unknown, the interaction of SP and ACE2 contributes significantly. SP-ACE2 binding results in host-cell dysfunction that precipitates the development of these acute and chronic symptoms, including host-cell death. Therefore, the serious long-term repercussions of COVID-19 should be closely monitored in infected patients with high SP and ACE2 expression.
